name: Get Paired
description:
Get Paired is my take on the classic memory game. This game is also the last entry for my 2019 self-challenge of one game per month.

HOW TO PLAY
Flip open a card and find a matching pair. To complete the level, you need to match all requested pairs.

CONTROLS
Right / Left Click - Flip a card
P / Escape Key - Pause

TOOLS
Audacity
Bfxr
Gimp
Inkscape Studio
Kdenlive
LMMS
OBS
Unity3D Visual Studio Community
VLC

BGM BY TEKNOAXE
Foggy Bottom Scurvy Harbor [Piano] -- Comedy/Piano/Background -- Royalty Free MusicMarch of the Rabbit -- Comedy/Orchestra -- Royalty Free Music
